definitions.definition: Characterized by, or moving in cycles , or happening at regular intervals ; cyclical
examples: The weather had a cyclic pattern of rain and sun.

definitions.definition: Having chains of atoms arranged in a ring .
examples: Benzene and cyclohexane are both cyclic compounds.

definitions.definition: Having parts arranged in a whorl .
Being generated by only one element .
Able to be inscribed in a circle .
Firing at its full cyclic rate .

main_definition: Characterized by, or moving in cycles , or happening at regular intervals ; cyclical
secondary_definitions: ( chemistry , of a compound ) Having chains of atoms arranged in a ring .
( botany ) Having parts arranged in a whorl .
( mathematics , of a group ) Being generated by only one element .
( geometry , of a polygon ) Able to be inscribed in a circle .
( firearms , of an automatic weapon ) Firing at its full cyclic rate .
